text: Herbert Robert McKnight (1 December 1883 – 1 May 1961) was an Australian rules footballer who played for the Collingwood Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * * *Bert McKnight's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1883 births Category:1961 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Bert McKnight
